about_dialog_description: Maskbook allows you to publish encrypted posts on social networks, so that you may mitigate the big data surveillance from the big corporations. Only you and your friends (who are also using Maskbook) can decrypt your encrypted posts.
add_to_key_store_failed_text:
{{error}}
This public key won't be saved in Maskbook.
add_to_key_store_failed_title: The public key is NOT verified
add_to_key_store_success: The public key has been added to the Keystore
add_to_key_store_verifying: The public key has been found, verifying‚Ä¶
additional_post_box__encrypted_failed: Please paste the following text into the post box.
additional_post_box__steganography_post_: In the next step, Maskbook will save an image that contains encrypted message. Please attach this image to your post so others can decrypt it.
This post is shared with my friends. You may install Maskbook to decrypt the content from the image. ([I:b]) {{random}}
automation_pasted_into_bio_box: [Maskbook] We helped you append the public key to your bio. Please review and publish it!
automation_request_click_edit_bio_button: Please click the ‚ÄúEdit bio‚Äù button or the pencil on the bio box.

new_avatar_url_placeholder: Leave it blank means no change
backup_wallet_hint: Keep the 12 mnemonic words OR private key below carefully in a safe place. You will need them to restore this wallet.

dashboard_attach_profile_step3_hint: Come back here and finish the procedure. Test if your setup is successful.

dashboard_backup_persona_hint: You can backup your persona in the following options.

dashboard_backup_persona_qr_hint: Keep the QR code carefully in a safe place. You will need them to restore the private key of this persona.
dashboard_backup_persona_text_hint: Keep the text above carefully in a safe place. You will need them to restore the private key of this persona.

dashboard_bio_test_succeeful: You have successfully connected your persona {{persona}} to @{{profile}} on {{domain}}.
dashboard_database_import_successful_hin: Your database has been restored. Existing data will be merged.
dashboard_delete_persona_confirm_hint: Do you want to delete the persona {{name}}? This operation cannot be reverted.

dashboard_init_header: Post on social networks without allowing the platforms to stalk you.
dashboard_init_step_-1: Be aware of your data when using Maskbook.
dashboard_init_step_-1_hint: Maskbook will collect some data (listed in the privacy policy) when you use it, but the developers of Maskbook have no access to them. The collected data are stored locally, except for the data which are necessary for enabling your friends to decrypt the posts you shared.
dashboard_init_step_1_hint: You may connect your social network profile to your persona in the next step.

name: Name
options_mobile_export_subtitle: DO NOT share it with others!

service_invalid_backup_file: This does not seem like a backup of Maskbook.

service_self_key_decryption_failed: Decryption failed. Maybe you selected a wrong identity or imported a key that was not used to encrypt this post.
service_unknown_payload: Unknown post version. You may need to update Maskbook.
set_up_consent_data_collection_hint: Maskbook will collect some data when you use it, but the developers of Maskbook have no access to them. The collected data are stored locally, except for the data which are necessary for enabling your friends to decrypt the posts you shared.

settings_disable_new_background_tab: Disable opening hidden tabs in the background
settings_disable_new_background_tab_desc: Deprecated behavior. Enable if you need to decrypt ancient posts (created before Jan 2020).
settings_image_based_payload_desc: Publishing post with image payload instead of text payload.
shared_choose_identity_title: Touch to switch your Maskbook account
wallet_confirmation_hint: I confirm that I need to create a wallet.
wallet_notification: This will create a new wallet other than the default wallet. You are responsible for keeping the private key to the wallet safe. Maskbook does not backup for you automatically. Please also note that Maskbook won't be able to pay for your transactions on Ethereum.
